summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered on March 25, 2002. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, totaling $41.04, and provides payment instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he utilized FedEx services for shipping.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: An invoice was issued to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services provided by FedEx.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: A package was delivered on March 11, 2002, as part of the services billed in the invoice.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-141-45842, dated March 25, 2002.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $41.04.
The invoice includes a discount of $41.14 for the period.
The invoice indicates that payment is due by April 9, 2002.
The document contains multiple references to Jeffrey Epstein's address.
